text: PrimeTel PLC is a telecommunications company from Cyprus. It provides voice, data, and video services. The company runs an advanced broadband network covering all of Cyprus. It also has international connections in Germany, Greece, Russia, and the United Kingdom. PrimeTel offers city-to-city connections, data communications, fiber-optic networks, and IP services in Europe and the Middle East. PrimeTel is one of the few companies in the area offering a complete range of services. It was the first company in Cyprus to operate as a Mobile Virtual Network Operator (MVNO). == References == Category:2003 establishments
title: PrimeTel
